Package model

Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
model.Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
A class used to manage inventory storage and searching of parts and products. Class also contains test data which can be loaded by setting loadTestData = true.

  • Method Details

    • addPart

      public static void addPart​(Part newPart)
      Adds new part to list containing all parts.
      Parameters:
      newPart - part to be added.

    • addProduct

      public static void addProduct​(Product newProduct)
      Adds new product to list containing all products.
      Parameters:
      newProduct - product to be added.

    • lookupPart

      public static Part lookupPart​(int partId)
      Finds and returns part based on given integer ID.
      Parameters:
      partId - numeric ID of part in question.

    • lookupProduct

      public static Product lookupProduct​(int productId)
      Finds and returns product based on given integer ID.
      Parameters:
      productId - numeric ID of product in question.
      Returns:
      null if no product found, product object if found.

    • lookupPart

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> lookupPart​(String partName)
      Finds and returns part(s) based on string input. Blank spaces and capitalization will not influence search results.
      Parameters:
      partName - can be part ID, or name, or both.
      Returns:
      list containing all parts matching input.

    • lookupProduct

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> lookupProduct​(String productName)
      Finds and returns product(s) based on string input. Blank spaces and capitalization will not influence search results.
      Parameters:
      productName - can be product ID, or name, or both.
      Returns:
      list containing all product matching input.

    • updatePart

      public static void updatePart​(int index, Part selectedPart)
      Replaces part with new part object.
      Parameters:
      index - location of part in list.
      selectedPart - new part to be used.

    • updateProduct

      public static void updateProduct​(int index, Product newProduct)
      Replaces product with new product object.
      Parameters:
      index - location of part in list.
      newProduct - product to be used.

    • deletePart

      public static boolean deletePart​(Part selectedPart)
      Deletes part from list containing all parts.
      Parameters:
      selectedPart - part to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if part was found and deleted, false if part was not located.

    • deleteProduct

      public static boolean deleteProduct​(Product selectedProduct)
      Deletes product from list containing all products.
      Parameters:
      selectedProduct - product to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if product was found and deleted, false if product was not located.

    • getAllParts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> getAllParts()
      Returns list of all parts.
      Returns:
      ObservableList containing all parts.

    • getAllProducts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> getAllProducts()
      Returns list of all products.
      Returns:
      ObservableList containing all products.

    • printAllParts

      public static void printAllParts()
      Prints all parts to the console. Used during development prior to GUI existing.

    • getPartIndex

      public static int getPartIndex​(int partId)
      Finds location of part.
      Parameters:
      partId - numeric ID of part.
      Returns:
      index location of part in list, or -1 if not found.

    • getProductIndex

      public static int getProductIndex​(int productId)
      Finds location of product.
      Parameters:
      productId - numeric ID of product.
      Returns:
      index location of product in list, or -1 if not found.

    • generateId

      public static int generateId​(String objectType)
      Generates unique ID for part or product, based on list length. Different lists are used based on input. Checks to verify ID is not already in use.
      Parameters:
      objectType - requires the string "Part" or "Product" other inputs won't generate ID.
      Returns:
      Generated ID, or -1 if ID creation failed.
